Title: Requires human service providers that contract with the state to pay their employees a certain minimum wage
Summary: Requires that all human services contracts between any public entity and a human services provider stipulate that the public entity will pay no less than 150% of the higher of: the otherwise applicable minimum wage in the state or any otherwise applicable wage rule or order and that the necessary amounts have been appropriated to ensure payment of such minimum wage.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to requiring human service providers that contract with the state to pay their employees a certain minimum wage
